title: Studies and Sociologists to use for the Education topic (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the Education topic such as ethnicity, Social class, gender, the national curriculum, streaming and the effectiveness of sanctions.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the Education topic such as ethnicity, Social class, gender, the national curriculum, streaming and the effectiveness of sanctions.
